ABOUT-ME.TEXT1: My passion for software development was sparked during my work with PC and CAD technologies in dental technology. This experience motivated me to pursue further training as a web developer. In this portfolio, I present projects that I have developed myself.
ABOUT-ME.TEXT2: Transitioning into software development was a deliberate decision, inspired by curiosity and a strong interest in future-oriented solutions in the field of modern applications.

SKILLS.TEXT: With the stacks listed here, I enjoy turning creative ideas into practical and functional projects.

PROJECTS.H3: Take a look at my projects and explore what I've been working on.

PROJECT1.DESCRIPTION: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help sharkie to find coins and poison bottles to fight against the killer whale.

PROJECT2.DESCRIPTION: Based on the Pok√©API a simple library that provides and catalogues Pokemon information.

PROJECT3.DESCRIPTION: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

PROJECT4.DESCRIPTION: Chat-Messenger application in the style of Slack for team communication. You can create channels or chat directly with your co-workers.

CONTACT.TEXT: I look forward to your message and to connecting with you personally.
